title: Copper Creek Apartments! Take a tour TODAY!
posting_body: ['Copper Creek offers the serenity of a quiet sanctuary while offering the benefits of living in proximity to the Las Vegas Strip.', 'With the convenience of nearby shopping centers, business services, schools, and parks, Copper Creek is in a perfect location in Silverado Ranch.', "Minutes from the I-15, I-215, and McCarran International Airport, Copper Creek's location is ideal for both personal and professional lifestyles.", 'Please visit our community and check out our Redwood Creek floor plan.', 'Apartment #2065: $1910 a month on a 12 month lease includes water/sewer/trash', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', 'Pet Park and Play Area', 'Clubhouse with Fireplace, TV and Pool Table', '2 Fully Equipped, State-of-the-Art 24 Hr.', "Fitness Centers with HD Flat Screen TV's and Free Weights", 'BBQ/Picnic Area', 'Yoga Classes', '2 Resort Style Pools and Spa', 'Ping-Pong Table', 'Business Center', 'Short Term Lease', 'Controlled Access/Gated', 'Media Room', 'Garages Available', 'Playground', 'Covered Parking', 'Night Patrol', '24 Hr. Emergency Maintenance Services', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'On-Site Management', 'Grocery, Retail, and Restaurants Close', 'By', 'Close to Shopping and Schools', 'Convenient Access to Public Transportation', 'Courtyard', 'Energy Star Certified', 'Recycling', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', 'Wood Vinyl Flooring Throughout', 'Furnished Apartments Available', 'Open and Spacious Floor Plans', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Microwave', 'Dishwasher', 'Electric Range', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Stainless Steel Sink', 'Raised Panel Oak Cabinets', 'Large Pantry', 'Disposal', 'Full Size Washer and Dryer', 'Walk-In Closets', 'Air Conditioner', 'Cable Ready', 'Roman Tubs in Master Bath', 'Ceiling Fans In All Bedrooms', 'Dual Phone Jack in Master Bedroom', '9ft Ceilings*', 'Ceramic Tile Entries', 'Blinds', 'Signature STYLE Series', 'Signature MOD Series', 'Signature THRIVE Series', 'Signature LIVE Series', 'Signature BLING Series', 'Signature LUX Series', 'Carpeting', 'Electronic Thermostat', 'Patio or Balcony with Storage', 'Security Alarm', 'PET POLICY', 'Pets - Max 3 allowed', 'Pet Friendly!', 'Pet Fee: $300.00 (Non-Refundable), Additional Pet(s): $150.00 each (Non-Refundable), Monthly Pet Rent: $30.00/1 pet; $40/2 pets; $50/3 pets (Limit 3).', 'Breed and Weight Restrictions Apply.', 'Call for Details!', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.']
